item.title: Halloumi Paprika
item.description: Difficulty: very easy Time: 10 minutes Ingredients (6 people): Halloumi (225g) Seasoning: Paprika (more than one type if available) Thyme Pepper Cayenne pepper (optional) Olive oil Instructions: Cut the halloumi into small slices. In a big pan heat some olive oil, then place the halloumi slices in the pan, add pepper and paprika. Fry until golden on one side then turn and add more seasoning. Add thyme to finish with.
